entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 21.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning early this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Temperature steady near minus 21. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 19.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 19. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 19.
